content: *it s tea time quickly crocheted with easy-care yarn this colorful tea cozy would make a lovely housewarming gift lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60671a corrections applied jan 14 2007 published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w skill level easy + level 3 lion® cotton article #760 and/or cotton-ease® article #830 7 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm special stitch space-2 spike st 2 row below work front and back in pattern crochet chain for tie seam to finish leaving opening for spout and handle weave tie through eyelet holes
